name: John & Jane
about_marriage: John and Jane have been happily married for five wonderful years. They met in college and have built a life full of love, laughter, and shared adventures.

name: Michael & Emily
about_marriage: Michael and Emily are high school sweethearts who tied the knot after a decade of togetherness. Their marriage is a testament to the power of friendship, trust, and shared dreams.

name: David & Alicia
about_marriage: David and Alicia's marriage is a fusion of cultures and traditions. Their journey is a vibrant blend of love, understanding, and the joy of raising a multicultural family.
